description: User registers and is auto logged in
steps: Open login page and switch to register mode
Enter name + email/phone + password and submit
Client stores tokens + workspaceId and redirects to conversation tab

description: User can see tool task execution results
steps: See pending tool tasks and confirm one
Worker runs the confirmed task and records tool_execution
Action tab shows recent executed tool tasks and can view response

description: AI extraction uses strict schema and does not crash
steps: Trigger journal extraction against an OpenAI-compatible LLM server
Server validates output against schema and stores extracted_item rows
If model output is invalid, server returns empty items instead of 500

description: Developer can run MVP with docker compose + env example
steps: Copy packages/server/.env.example to packages/server/.env and set DATABASE_URL/JWT_SECRET
Run migrations and start server + worker + client
Login/register and use core MVP flow end-to-end
